title: Sociology A Level Paper 3 – The Night Before Podcast
description: It’s the last of the Sociology exams - you’re nearly there! Join Le-My for some last-minute tips, tricks, and stress busters before A Level Sociology Paper 3 tomorrow. Le-My will be delving into Functionalists'  views on crime, looking at how gender plays a role in the social distribution of crime, and lastly, exploring Foucault's ideas on prevention & punishment. For more info visit https://www.senecalearning.com/
dc:creator: Seneca Learning Revision
